The Team

Viktoras Veitas

Lead Formulator

Jon Echanove

Trainer and Facilitator

Rasa Morkunaite

Relations Manager

We are a small team of independent professionals with extensive of experience in management consulting, policy design, change management, executive coaching, social science research, European project's management and more. Our combined interdisciplinary expertise allows us to offer a unique, grounded in scientific research and tested in practice methodology of stakeholders' management.
